translations.name: The Story Bible
translations.description: The Story Bible is a paraphrase of the Bible by Pearl S. Buck, the author of The Good Earth. This 1971 publication, which was not advertised as a Bible translation, summarizes 72 of the most popular stories in the Bible, and was intended as an introduction to the scriptures for children.
